about.title: About Me
about.education_subtitle: Higher Technician in Multiplatform Application Development
about.p1: As a Software Developer, my passion is programming and seeing how code transforms into functional and robust applications. I am a Higher Technician in Multiplatform Application Development, specializing in the Java and Kotlin ecosystem to create solutions for both backend and desktop and mobile applications.
about.p2: My experience is focused on backend development, where I use tools like Spring Boot and Hibernate to build RESTful APIs and efficiently manage SQL databases. I also have knowledge in frontend development with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React to create functional user interfaces.
about.p3: I believe in the importance of writing quality code, which is why I apply good testing practices and agile methodologies to ensure software stability. I am looking for a position where I can contribute my skills, face new challenges, and continue to grow as a professional every day.
